description: This Java source file defines a REST controller in a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller that manages basic endpoints for a Spring Boot backend, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and info endpoints.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI, preserving original request attributes.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns application health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns application information.
